# make_fakes 
[Example](https://github.com/lezzles11/make_fakes/blob/master/playground.js)

![NPM Downloads](https://img.shields.io/npm/dw/make_fakes)

```bash
npm install @faker-js/faker
npm install make_fakes 
```

## Create an array of objects, given an object, number and boolean (to indicate whether or not to append the id to each object)

```js
// import
const {makeFakes} = require("make_fakes")


let hourglass = {
    public: "boolean",
    seconds: "number",
    start: "past_date",
    description: "paragraph",
    edit: "date",
    end: "future_date",
    status: ["to do", "doing", "done"],
    title: "string",
    email: "email",
    created: "number_date"
}

let getMany = makeFakes.createMany(hourglass, 2, true)
console.log(getMany)[
  {
    public: true,
    seconds: 101,
    start: 2021-11-01T17:48:29.046Z,
    description: 'Laboriosam maxime autem nobis aut et voluptatem eius voluptate nihil. Cum architecto suscipit aut fugiat inventore. Magni in reiciendis veritatis.',
    edit: 2022-03-01T17:06:48.330Z,
    end: 2023-01-20T22:46:10.374Z,
    status: 'done',
    title: 'voluptates',
    email: 'Jacey_Cormier@hotmail.com',
    created: 1646177364422,
    id: 1
  },
  {
    public: true,
    seconds: 97,
    start: 2021-03-30T17:32:16.004Z,
    description: 'Nemo earum sequi vitae beatae quaerat voluptatum adipisci consequuntur magni. Aut atque doloremque. Sunt consequatur quod enim. Aut eaque omnis eaque qui ad omnis enim. Blanditiis odio deleniti et quis explicabo eius. Est accusamus iste.',
    edit: 2022-03-01T03:45:52.634Z,
    end: 2022-11-15T18:28:19.135Z,
    status: 'to do',
    title: 'recusandae',
    email: 'Johann.Okuneva@gmail.com',
    created: 1646177364422,
    id: 2
  }
]
```

## Create an array of dirty data 

```js
let hourglass = {
    public: "boolean",
    seconds: "number",
    start: "past_date",
    description: "paragraph",
    edit: "date",
    end: "future_date",
    status: ["to do", "doing", "done"],
    title: "string",
    email: "email",
    created: "number_date"
}

let getManyDirty = makeFakes.createManyDirty(hourglass, 2, true)
console.log("ðŸš€ ~ file: playground.js ~ line 18 ~ getManyDirty", getManyDirty)
[
  {
    public: 'true',
    seconds: undefined,
    start: '2022-01-04',
    description: undefined,
    edit: undefined,
    end: '01/11/2023',
    status: undefined,
    title: undefined,
    email: 'asperiores',
    created: '2022-06-26',
    id: 1
  },
  {
    public: undefined,
    seconds: undefined,
    start: undefined,
    description: undefined,
    edit: '09/14/2021',
    end: '02/12/2023',
    status: undefined,
    title: undefined,
    email: 'architecto',
    created: 'Aug 21, 2022',
    id: 2
  }
]
```

<a name="MakeFakes+createOne"></a>

### makeFakes.createOne(object) â‡’ <code>any</code>
makeFakes.createOne(object)

**Kind**: instance method of [<code>MakeFakes</code>](#MakeFakes)  
**Date**: 2022-03-02  

| Param  | Type             |
|--------|------------------|
| object | <code>any</code> |

**Example**  
```js
let getOne = makeFakes.createOne(hourglass)
let hourglass = {
public: "boolean",
seconds: "number",
start: "past_date",
end: "future_date",
status: ["to do", "doing", "done"],
title: "string",
email: "email",
created: "number_date"
}
// output {
public: true,
seconds: 60,
start: 2022-01-19T19:12:02.649Z,
end: 2022-11-05T16:03:38.641Z,
status: 'to do',
title: 'recusandae',
email: 'Daron.Davis@gmail.com',
created: 1646170430367
}
```
<a name="MakeFakes+createOneDirty"></a>

### makeFakes.createOneDirty(object, currIndex) â‡’ <code>any</code>
Returns realistic fake dirty data
boolean -> boolean to string or undefined 
number -> stringed number, float, undefined 
email -> string, number, undefined
password -> " ", undefined, paragraph,
past_date -> dateInput format, LL format, undefined
future_date -> L format, l format, undefined
number_date -> dateInput format, ll format
phone -> future_date, boolean, undefined
image -> string, " ", undefined

**Kind**: instance method of [<code>MakeFakes</code>](#MakeFakes)  
**Date**: 2022-03-02  

| Param     | Type             |
|-----------|------------------|
| object    | <code>any</code> |
| currIndex | <code>any</code> |

**Example**  
```js
//input let hourglass = {
public: "boolean",
seconds: "number",
start: "past_date",
end: "future_date",
status: ["to do", "doing", "done"],
title: "string",
email: "email",
created: "number_date"
}
output // { public: 'true',â€ˆ
seconds: 86421.89,â€ˆ
start: '2021-10-14',â€ˆ
end: '07/17/2022',â€ˆ
status: undefined,â€ˆ
title: 102,â€ˆ
email: 6,â€ˆ
created: '2022-06-23' }â€ˆ
```

### makeFakes.createMany(object, length, addId) â‡’ <code>array</code>
let getArray = makeFakes.createMany(hourglass, number)

**Kind**: instance method of [<code>MakeFakes</code>](#MakeFakes)  
**Date**: 2022-03-02  

| Param  | Type             | Default            |
|--------|------------------|--------------------|
| object | <code>any</code> |                    |
| length | <code>any</code> | <code>1</code>     |
| addId  | <code>any</code> | <code>false</code> |

**Example**  
```js
let getArray = makeFakes.createMany(hourglass, 3)
let hourglass = {
public: "boolean",
seconds: "number",
start: "past_date",
end: "future_date",
status: ["to do", "doing", "done"],
title: "string",
email: "email",
created: "number_date"
}
[
{
public: false,
seconds: 156,
start: 2021-03-27T04:26:13.008Z,
end: 2022-08-11T17:11:58.936Z,
status: 'done',
title: 'voluptates',
email: 'Winston.Hayes@gmail.com',
created: 1646170499317,
id: 1
},
{
public: false,
seconds: 69,
start: 2021-09-19T18:13:01.908Z,
end: 2022-11-22T00:39:23.213Z,
status: 'doing',
title: 'blanditiis',
email: 'Greyson.Roob@yahoo.com',
created: 1646170499317,
id: 2
},
{
public: false,
seconds: 163,
start: 2021-10-14T04:50:07.263Z,
end: 2022-04-02T03:39:40.203Z,
status: 'done',
title: 'reiciendis',
email: 'Braden_Baumbach97@gmail.com',
created: 1646170499317,
id: 3
}
]
```

start: 'November 18, 2022',â€ˆ
